The Incaendio application was developed to help people identify causes of stress in their life, and detect whether there is any risk for a burnout.
Burnout
Burnout is defined as "the long-term consequence of aversive working conditions characterized by the simultaneous experience of the symptoms of exhaustion and disengagement from one's job."
You will be asked a number of questions about your behaviour and feelings during daily life. After, you will be presented with some tips to help decrease the chance of you getting a burnout. Proceed to the [[introduction|introduction page]].
